tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Believes in reducing the medicine at her level best by staying in regular touch with the patient. Consultation charges are very nominal.

I visited first time and I found that Dr Nandani is very caring about patients, very understandable and also a good listener.

Thank you much Dr Nandani.

‚ÄúMedicine cure diseases but only doctors can cure patients.‚Äù
This goes so well appropriate to Dr. Nandini.
I consulted her for my entire family when we caught COVID on May2 2021 when the whole country was terrified and before talking to her I was completely blank like what to do and what not do to.
She treated us well not only with the medicines but also with her assurance and positive words, even though we were communicating online still felt as personal touch. Always up for resolving queries and anxiety (which is the most bad thing I felt during covid). 
Supremely supportive, Gratitude to Aarogyaüôèüôè

Hi, Neetu Gupta this side
Dr Nandini came in my life as a hope of ray as she treated my 2 year old skin allergy problem in 2months itself. I can use many superlative adjectives for her..... She is just awesome, polite, dedicated doctor. Take care of her patient utmost. Most recommendable Dr according to me. Thank you so much Doctor. God bless you.

review: We are in touch with Dr. Nandini for the last 3 months when we got my wife's EEG at AAROGYA CLINIC. There was problem in EEG  Report so Dr.Nandini prescribed some medicines and now wife is feeling much much better now . Dr. Nandini's way of communication is such a positive that my wife's mental illness is nowhere when she talks to her over phone. Thanks Dr. Nandini. Moreover during this 2nd wave of covid 19  she has advised us preventive measures for saving from carona virus and thank God and Dr. Nandini that we both senior citizens are safe from virus

Dr. Nandini has turned out be an angel to my family. In these tough times, Where my Family got Covid + and me being away from my family in different city, She gave them the right medication, as very friendly and approachable for any queries/concern. She explains it all in layman's language until you are satisfied. With very limited and very very accurate set of medicine and tests, my family is recovering now. She is very dedicated and highly professional Doctor which is rare to find these days. Keep going Dr. Nandini Agarwal.
